citations.narrative:
The facility’s contingency plan does not have a documented review within the last year. Annual review of a contingency
plan is important to ensure that potential disasters and emergencies have been addressed in the plan and it is still up to
date and functional. Correct by 27 June 2024 by reviewing the contingency plan on an annual basis and document the
review, including any changes made.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
Additional Inspectors:
Shoshana Tanenbaum, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER
Samantha Talley, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.134(b) 
   
Contingency planning. 
The facility’s contingency plan does not have a documented review within the last year. Annual review of a contingency 
plan is important to ensure that potential disasters and emergencies have been addressed in the plan and it is still up to 
date and functional. Correct by 27 June 2024 by reviewing the contingency plan on an annual basis and document the 
review, including any changes made. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Shoshana Tanenbaum, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER 
Samantha Talley, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: RED FOX (INCLUDES SILVER FOX & CROSS FOX)
